Know more About Charles..

Hello, I'm Charles Muema.

Am an interdisciplinary designer currently living in Kenya. I am a computer Scientist by profession, currently studing for my bachelors degree in Masinde Muliro University of science and technology.

I have delved into several languages, which i use for development. I am very confident in them, as i work with flow as i use them. They include:
Python,
Java,
PHP,
Android,
JavaScript

Services

I offer solutions for real-world problems by the use of the following;

Android

Equipped with skills in Android development lamguages in java, by the use of Android Studio and in Python by the use of Kivy, using an editor like visual Studio code.

Web-design

Using Python, i develop both front and back end.I use Bootstrap mainly for front end designs and the Python-Django for back end Designs.

Networking

I passionately Networking, by providing solutions in the networking industry.

Extras

I also deal with Linux, passionate in Internet of things, Hardware repairs and extra more.
